articles.description: Former England striker Gary Lineker has spoken about the sale of Diego Maradona's 'Hand of God' shirt from the World Cup quarter-final against Argentina in 1986
articles.content:
Gary Lineker has reacted after former England team-mate Steve Hodge sold Diego Maradona 's infamous 'Hand of God' shirt for over £7million at auction.

articles.title: Newcastle 'ready to move on' £28m star from St James' Park - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Newcastle United star Allan Saint-Maximin is “going to be looking for a new club” this summer after being linked with a St James’ Park exit.
articles.content:
Newcastle United star Allan Saint-Maximin is going to be looking for a new club this summer, believes transfer insider Dean Jones.
